page.title: 06PEOPLE'S JOBS IN CUCKFIELD 1
page.content: We interviewed an equal number of men and women within the area and also after studying census returns for 1982 have made the following conclusions: The average age of the workforce in Cuckfield is{44}yrs. Occupations are mainly tertiary, Civil servants, Airline pilots, Shop assistants and teachers.{64.3%}work for an employer and{35.7%}work on a private basis. Out of a working population of{1232, 326 people have a degree or vocational qualifications.{69.2%}needed qualifications for their job while {30.8%}didn't.{6.7%}of the working population don't need to travel any distance to work. The most popular means of transport is the car{(56.7%), {13.3%}travel by train,{3.3%}by bike and{16.7%}on foot. With regard to dress at work,{18.5%}wear a uniform, {22.2%}casual clothes &{59.3%}a suit.
